title: Player's In-Game Purchase Failed
description: A player was charged for an in-game item but never received it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's account and purchase history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the player and the specific failed transaction.

tasks.description: Verify the payment was successful with the payment provider but the item was not delivered in-game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the payment was processed but the item entitlement failed.

tasks.description: Manually grant the purchased item to the player's in-game inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the item to the player's account.
